column2: "Hello, I still haven't been able to find Hadred's whereabouts."
"Aside from that I've also had to deal with other Dragonkin going berserk."
"It's better to not ask about any other missions that I've been given."
"All I do is carry out the orders that have been given to me."
"That's why I find someone like you, who follows orders and yet still moves of their own accord, intriguing."
"So you're not given any specific order, so why would you..."
"That was a rhetorical question. Don't bother answering it. Anyways, please excuse me."
